meanings.definition: A piece of evidence or information used in solving a mystery or problem.
meanings.sent1: The detective found a crucial clue at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: The missing puzzle piece was the final clue.
meanings.sent3: The mysterious note turned out to be a helpful clue.
meanings.sent4: Each clue led them closer to the treasure.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph was a valuable clue in the investigation.
